column1: Welcome to Quiz Wiz! Here’s how to play:
Pick from Sports, History, and Music. Choose wisely!
Each question has a 20-second timer. Answer quickly!
Miss two questions in one category, and you’ll move to another category. Miss two questions in two different categories, and the game ends.
Answer at least 5 out of 7 questions correctly in all three categories to unlock the bonus round: Jayisms.
Remember, a quick wit is the best spell in your arsenal. Good luck!
